top_comments.comment:
A HUGE thanks to Drew and Linda Scott for helping design the interior of my new home! Go follow them on YouTube! https://www.youtube.com/athome. 

Would you like to see any other videos of the house? I can show whats in my fridge, pantry, Mike's Office, and more! Let me know
Ro looks so tiny in this house. And your house is beautiful.
You should name your barista thing Bree
name suggestion for the coffee machine: Morgan

comments_since_last_sample.body: the fact that RO’s bedroom/bathroom/closet combined is bigger than my entire house makes me feel poor lmao
This is calling me poor in 100 different languages 🤣
no offence but the dress u r wearing reminds me of arizona tea! :D Love your channel tho <3 been here since 2013

Your house looks like Rebecca’s house except for the black stairs and some of it is different but it’s the same design and just the table in the patio is different it looks exactly like Rebecca’s house

Why is everything so big?? Like you can fit my kitchen and living room just in your master room 🙃
Also seeing this house makes me feel like "just imagine cleaning that..." 😂😂
You should name your barista thing Bree

You should definitely do a Pantry/Fridges tour, would be pretty cool

Ps: the coffee machine should be called Barry the Barista
hi ro you should show ijustine your new house
Your house looks soo beautiful omg! I would LOOOVE to see new fridge and pantry tour videos! And plssss do a christmas decorations video! :)
This house is definetly more expensive than my life (maybe twice), but damn, that’s a gorgeous desing all through😍
How much was this house sold
Wow your lucky this is the prettiest house I’ve ever seen 😍

You deserve this more than anyone Ro! The house is absolutely gorgeous and I love how much storage it has 😊You radiate so much love, happiness and energy that I can feel it all the way from my screen! Your love for cooking/baking has inspired me more than you could imagine. I sometimes fail at baking but then I remind myself that I won't get anywhere if I don't at least try. May God Bless You And Your Family! ♥
Name the coffe machine Cathy so it’s Cathy the coffee machine
Ro looks so tiny in this house. And your house is beautiful.
name suggestion for the coffee machine: Morgan
